alert.note: Alert for Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 20 at 3:11AM EST until November 21 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 1 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected, with some snow and sleet possible for a few hours. Total snow and sleet accumulations of less than one inch. Ice accumulations of a light glaze to one tenth of an inch, with up to two tenths of an inch on the ridges. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, western Virginia and eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 1 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
